activities: IPC is a SUBWAY® franchisee-owned cooperative which acts as the purchasing organization for its franchisee members.  IPC also provides certain services to its franchisee members and sister organizations. IPC and it''s subsidiary, VPS, may receive personal information of franchisees from the EU from Doctor''s Associates, Inc. (DAI), the franchisor, owner and licensor of the SUBWAY® trademark.  This personal information is received in order to provide them with services relating to their contracts with DAI.  IPC may also receive personal information from their customers in order to provide customer service to them.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All personal data except human resources
recoursemech: European Union Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
